content: S-MD PPH #2 Self-drilling pan screws Self-drilling pan head screw (zinc-plated) for fastening sheet metal to steel substructures ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Fast and robust drill tip Galvanized zinc coating for indoor use Screws driven in quickly due to optimized drill point geometry Applications Fastening profile steel sheets to light- and medium-gauge steel framing – maximum combined thickness up to 0.100 inch ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Phillips pan head Screw drive/recess type: PH #2 Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Phillips pan head | Screw drive/recess type | PH #2 | Collated | No | Product Class | Standard | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 311441 - Self-drill screw 8-18 x 1/2 PPH2 - Package Size 10000 pc
